AbilityController handles the user interface logic for abilities, managing animations and interactions within a UI component.

Functional interface for handling animation stop notifications.

Component
Designed to simplify the work with components, stores the Parent obj, updates the basic component, provides extra functionality
Game
The main games logic class
GameController
Class GameController is designed to provide comunication betwean model and visualization, stores all players and bots and informs all of them about the model changes.
GameControllerModuleService
Interface GameControllerModuleService contains all methods of GaneConteroller that can be used in Model
GameControllerVisualService
Interface GameControllerModuleService contains all methods of GaneConteroller that can be used in Visualization
GameFinish
This class represents the end screen of a game, displaying the result and relevant player information.

LiberalBotPlayerGameManager

PlayerPaneController
Class PlayerPaneController shows the information about a layer such as its icon, name, current role, and allows to choose it.

Political<R>
Class Political designed to controll the right-usagem and work with cards in a hand
PopupLayerManager
class Designed to controll the popups on some specific surface, calls first when gets a request activate a plane and then when gets finish requst calls finish method of currect popup and then activate next one.

All popup classes that have to extend this class

The ShowDeath class extends PopupComponent and displays the death message for the player

The SpyBoardController class extends Component to manage and display a board with spy cards in a GUI application.

Manages game logic and interactions for a spy bot player in a political simulation game.

manages the vote surface, and shows the appearence animations

Voting
